statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -9 \\ 10 \\ -9 \\ -10 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ -14 \\ 7 \\ 8 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
